entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 04:24 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
